amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part A of House Report 116-51 to prohibit future administrative actions that would result in a reduction in the availability, affordability, and comprehensiveness of health insurance coverage for vulnerable populations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part A of House Report 116-51 to prohibit future administrative actions that would result in a reduction in the availability, affordability, and comprehensiveness of health insurance coverage for vulnerable populations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Rouda.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rouda amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
